## \_isFormStateBinding() function

Check if the given object is a valid form state binding [FormStateBinding](./dynamic-forms.formstatebinding.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _isFormStateBinding(binding: unknown): binding is FormStateBinding<object, string, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  binding | unknown | The object that should be checked.  Returns true if the object is a valid form state bidning, else false. |

<b>Returns:</b>

binding is [FormStateBinding](./dynamic-forms.formstatebinding.md)<!-- -->&lt;object, string, unknown&gt;
